article_title: Police investigate robbery at Wichita Sonic Drive-In
article_text:
Police are investigating a robbery at a Sonic Drive-In in southeast Wichita.

It happened at the Sonic location at 2224 South Oliver. Sgt. Roger Runft said three employees were closing the business just after midnight Saturday when a man entered and pulled a silver handgun, demanding cash.

The suspect was able to take all of the cash from the day and ran from the business. He has not been located.
